dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 983 IH: Resource Management Practices Protection Act of 2017
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Walden introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To bar prosecution under section 844(f)(1) of title 18, United States Code, in certain cases.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Resource Management Practices Protection Act of 2017.

section.header: Bar to prosecution under section 844(f)(1) of title 18, United States Code, in certain cases
section.text: Section 844(f)(1) of title 18, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: by adding after and below the end the following:

clause.text: the damage or destruction, or attempt to damage or destroy, is by means of a fire that—

subclause.text: is set by a person to property owned by the person—

item.text: to prevent an imminent threat of damage to that property; or
as part of any other generally accepted practice for managing vegetation on timber, grazing, or farm land;

subclause.text: does not pose a serious threat of injury to any individual or damage to any building, dwelling, or vehicle of the United States; and
does not result in death or serious bodily injury to any individual; and

clause.text: an individual who has not attained 16 years of age is not used in setting the fire.
